workingMode.message: Which working mode do you want to use?
workingMode.autoDescription: Creates a project and 100 keys automatically.
workingMode.manualDescription: Asks you what to do step by step.

keys.message: How many keys do you want to create?

project.message: Do you want to create a new project (yes) or use an existing one (no)?

id.message: What is the project Id of the existing project?
id.invalid: The project Id is invalid. Please try again.

gcloud.notInstalled: Seems like you don't have %s installed. Please install it and try again.
gcloud.projectQuotaExceeded: You have exceeded your project quota. Please use a different Google account.

errors.stacktrace: The stacktrace has been saved to %s. Please report this issue to rdx.
errors.noStacktrace: The stacktrace could not be saved.
